import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='https://phonebook-backend-sljo.onrender.com/api/persons';//'http://localhost:3001/api/persons'
var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var createperson=function createperson(nameObject){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,nameObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var removeperson=function removeperson(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var updateperson=function updateperson(id,newObject){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,createperson:createperson,removeperson:removeperson,updateperson:updateperson};
